description:
<><><> Fiverr for newbies: Learn the basics of selling on Fiverr <><><> 

This course is a starter course for newbies designed to teach you some basics about selling on Fiverr to get the best experience you would need to purchase the full course. Did you know you can make more then $5 on Fiverr? Fiverr started as a way to get only $5 but over the years evolved into one of the largest virtual product selling platform online. 

On Fiverr you can sell your services and even some physical products. Unlike other online platforms Fiverr does bring you traffic to your gigs if they start to get sales. With some marketing on your own you can start the snowball effect once you learn how to do it you can easily make extra side income on Fiverr and if you are really good you might be able to make fulltime living just selling Fiverr gigs.

This course will teach you the basics you need to understand Fiverr see you on the inside...
title: Fiverr for newbies: Learn the basics of selling on Fiverr
